# Wisdom, Friendship, Rhetoric

## Overview {-}

Unit 3 includes four video lectures. The first lecture is about the challenges and solutions to rhetoric (the art of persuasion). The second lecture is about how to apply some skills of rhetoric to everyday life.

### Learning Outcomes {-}

When youâ€™ve completed this unit, you will have learned how to:

- Identify the problems and benefits of persuasion
- Practice the skills of persuasion in everyday life
- Set proper goals for social interactions by applying these skills of persuasion
